title: there used to be a large oak tree in the land area that is now cleared for a new \buffalo wild wings restaurant\". was this tree torn down or moved? are there no laws protecting these endangered southern species? "
text: Hello. Here's a link with information about the city's tree regulations: http://www.wilmingtonnc.gov/community_services/parks_landscaping/tree_management/wilmington_tree_commission.aspx
